attributes.action: Stop selling NHS practices and services to business owners!
attributes.additional_details: NHS should not be in the hands of business owners in any form to prevent a faulty healthcare system seen in such countries like the United States.
attributes.background: I would like the government or parliament to prevent any further sale of any of the NHS practices, services or any NHS related Activities, if possible even revert to complete government ownership removing PROFIT organisations entirely from the NHS.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure whether you want to stop an increase in private providers in the NHS or remove all private providers currently operating. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
